message: Let's split the money fairly, Bob. I take $60, you take $40. It's best to settle this quickly with the inflation and all.
I think I deserve a bit more, considering I'm taking the risk of going further with inflation.
Bob, the inflation is eating away at our potential gains. Let's be reasonable.  I'll take a slight cut from my previous offer, you get $45.
I'm willing to take the risk, I think I can get more. Inflation is a problem, but I'm not desperate yet.
Bob, let's stop wasting time. We're losing money with every passing round. A 50/50 split is the fairest and fastest way to end this.
